item.title: [PI]Adding Quests the the Achievement tab.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:2, topic:458942”]click on the quest, look in your run.cmd to see what the actionbutton Id is, then goto clickingbuttons.java and do somthing like

case 5000: ( action button id c.showiterface = 3434 ( watever it is i just made that up) return;[/quote]Thank you, that helped me learn a little, but I already searched;
Actionbuttons: 114112-114130
and I searched for the interface, witch is basically all I need. I tried using my Rules cmd interface, but it didn’t work.
I would like to state; I have TeamViewer now if anyone could help me out.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Adding Quests the the Achievement tab.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

RSInterface|Client Sided|.

//Achievement tab addText(29295, "@cya@!HOLIDAY EVENTS!", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29296, "New Years Day", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29297, "Valentine's Day", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29298, "Easter", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29299, "St. Patrick's Day", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29300, "Halloween", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29301, "Veteran's Day", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29302, "Thanksgiving Day", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29303, "Christmas", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29304, "@cya@PLAYER'S QUESTS", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29305, "Wilderness can be Dangerous", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29306, "Grim Reaper's Revenge", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29307, "Underneath a Rock", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29308, "Spider's Revenge", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29309, "Lure's Pride", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29310, "@gre@MEMEBER'S QUESTS", 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29311, "Become Legit Player", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29312, "Become Legit Donor", " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29313, "Become Legit Staff", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29314, "Become Legit Veteran", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); } catch(Exception e){
I need to make it where when I click them, they open up with the Quest Details Interface.
